title: Hypnosis Network - The Pain Solution
description:
Hypnosis: The Pain Solution
By Maggie Philips, Ph.D., director of the California Institute of Clinical Hypnosis

4 CD program by the Hypnosis Network.
 
Designed for people who are not responding to typical pain interventions, this program will provide you with a thorough understanding of how pain works, and will provide you with the tools to overcome it.

Learn how to:

-Manage "untreatable" pain
-Trust your innate abilities to heal
-Create comfort in pain zones in your body
-Achieve rapid relief from pain symptoms
-Control your pain signals
-Use the mind-body connection

Disc 1
-Introduction
-The Problem of Pain
-How Hypnosis Relieves Pain
-Understanding Pain
-Using Mental Focus to Shift Pain
-Closing the Pain Gate on Stress and Trauma

Disc 2
-Mapping Your Pain
-Turning On The Calming Brain
-Mindfulness and Pain
-Hypnosis for Mindfulness

Disc 3
-Relaxation: A Pain Prescription
-Relaxation Exercise
-Adding Imagery
-Multi-Sensory Imagery Exercise

Disc 4
-Transforming Pain
-The Ball of Pain
-Pain Free Movement
-The Brain's Pain Control Room


Encoded in 96 kbps.
Total length: 4:13:18
